NetworkElements.OpticalNIC

    Package Description
    NetworkElements  

    • Uses of OpticalNIC in NetworkElements

      Methods in NetworkElements that return OpticalNIC 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      OpticalNIC OtoOLink.getDest()
      Returns the destination NIC for this link.
      OpticalNIC OpticalNIC.getProtectionNIC()
      Returns the protection NIC of this NIC, or null if this card does not have a protection NIC
      OpticalNIC OtoOLink.getSource()
      Returns the source NIC for this link.
      OpticalNIC OpticalNIC.getWorkingNIC()
      Returns the working NIC of this NIC, or null if this card is not a protection NIC

      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      This method processes a packet when it is received from any location (including being created on this router from the source method).
      void OtoOLink.sendData(Packet packet, int wavelength, OpticalNIC source)
      Sends data from the source NIC joined to this link, to the dest NIC joined to this link
      void SONETDXC.sendRingPacket(STS3Packet packet, int wavelength, OpticalNIC nic)
      Sends a packet out onto the ring that this SONET DXC is joined to
      void OpticalNIC.setIsProtection(OpticalNIC workingNIC)
      Sets whether or not this NIC is a protection NIC for a working NIC
      void OpticalNIC.setIsWorking(OpticalNIC protectionNIC)
      Sets whether or not this NIC has a protection NIC
